DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy celecoxib versus placebo treatment patient knee osteoarthritis unresponsive treatment prescription strength naproxen ibuprofen could tolerate prescription strength naproxen ibuprofen
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Celecoxib Versus Placebo Treatment Patients With Osteoarthritis Knee Who Were Unresponsive Naproxen Ibuprofen
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : OA knee flare state baseline visit functional capacity class IIII Failed adequate trial naproxen ibuprofen ( prescription strength ) within past 5 year due lack efficacy , tolerability ; duration prescription strength ibuprofen naproxen must minimum 2 week drug respective recommend dos failure due lack efficacy , duration failure due lack tolerability Exclusion criterion : Inflammatory arthritis gout/pseudogout acute flare within past 2 year ( subject fibrositis fibromyalgia exclude ) Received acetaminophen within 24 hour baseline visit Use mobility assist device less six week prior study screen use walker History gastrointestinal ( GI ) perforation , obstruction , bleed Diagnosed treated GI ulcer within 60 day prior first dose study medication Recieved corticosteroid hyaluronic acid within certain timeframe study
